# Awesome Claude Code

> Claude Code extension for PHP 8.5 developers

## What is this?

A Composer package that adds 40+ skills, agents, and commands to Claude Code for PHP development with DDD, CQRS, and Clean Architecture patterns.

## Installation

```bash
composer require dykyi-roman/awesome-claude-code
```

## Key Features

- DDD component generators (Value Objects, Entities, Aggregates, Domain Events, Repositories)
- CQRS generators (Commands, Queries, Handlers)
- Architecture audit tools (DDD, CQRS, Clean Architecture, Hexagonal, Event Sourcing)
- Saga and Outbox pattern support for distributed systems
- Anti-Corruption Layer generators for external integrations
- Event-Driven Architecture patterns and knowledge bases

## Supported Patterns

- Domain-Driven Design (DDD)
- Command Query Responsibility Segregation (CQRS)
- Clean Architecture
- Hexagonal Architecture (Ports & Adapters)
- Event Sourcing
- Event-Driven Architecture (EDA)
- Saga Pattern
- Outbox Pattern
- Anti-Corruption Layer (ACL)

## Components

### Commands
- /acc-architecture-audit - Multi-pattern architecture audit
- /acc-ddd-audit - DDD compliance analysis
- /acc-claude-code - Interactive wizard for extensions
- /acc-commit - Auto-generate commit messages

### Agents
- acc-architecture-auditor - Multi-pattern auditor
- acc-ddd-generator - DDD component generator
- acc-pattern-generator - Advanced pattern generator

### Generator Skills
- acc-create-value-object - Value Objects with tests
- acc-create-entity - Entities with tests
- acc-create-aggregate - Aggregates with events
- acc-create-command - CQRS Commands
- acc-create-query - CQRS Queries
- acc-create-saga-pattern - Saga orchestration
- acc-create-outbox-pattern - Transactional outbox
- acc-create-anti-corruption-layer - ACL components

- GitHub: https://github.com/dykyi-roman/awesome-claude-code
- Packagist: https://packagist.org/packages/dykyi-roman/awesome-claude-code
